code: @Override public boolean process(Exchange exchange, AsyncCallback async) {     final Message msg = exchange.getIn().     final Object value = msg.getBody().     log.debug("Processing message: {}", value).     final CompletableFuture<?> future.     if (this.methodId == null) {         future = this.connection.writeValue(this.nodeId, value).     } else {         future = this.connection.call(this.nodeId, this.methodId, value).     }     final Boolean await = msg.getHeader("await", this.defaultAwaitWrites, Boolean.class).     if (TRUE.equals(await)) {         future.whenComplete((v, ex) -> async.done(false)).         return false.     } else {         return true.     } }
